小河馬奇寶寶
Kiboko the Baby Hippo
kDesc
Adult hippos can be pretty dangerous, but Kiboko just wants to play with you. [#Legal]
Les hippopotames adultes peuvent être assez dangereux, mais Kiboko veut juste jouer avec vous. [#Legal]
Ausgewachsene Nilpferde können sehr gefährlich werden, doch Kiboko will nur spielen. [#Legal]
Gli ippopotami adulti possono essere piuttosto pericolosi, invece Kiboko vuole solo giocare con te. [#Legal]
Los hipopótamos adultos pueden ser muy peligrosos, pero Kiboko solo quiere jugar contigo. [#Legal]
大人のカバは危険だけど、キボコちゃんなら安心！ [#Legal]
다 큰 하마는 아주 위험할 수 있지만, 키보코는 단지 당신하고만 놀고 싶어 해요. [#Legal]
Adult hippos can be pretty dangerous, but Kiboko just wants to play with you. [#Legal]
成年的河馬非常凶猛，不過奇寶寶只想跟你玩。 [#Legal]
成年的河馬非常凶猛，不過奇寶寶只想跟你玩。 [#Legal]
Adult hippos can be pretty dangerous, but Kiboko just wants to play with you. [#Legal]
